meanings.definition: A monetary unit of the Netherlands, equal to 100 cents.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people used guilders to buy goods and services.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her euros for guilders before traveling to Amsterdam.
meanings.sent3: The guilder in his pocket jingled happily as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand guilders to him.
meanings.sent5: The colorful guilder bills fluttered in the wind like autumn leaves.
